website_summaries.verdict: The perfect set of greeting cards for anyone who loves puns.
pros: Each card has an adorable cartoon image and funny pun
Blank interiors let you add a personal message
Cards arrive in a plastic storage container to prevent any damage
Thick, high-quality card stock with a beautiful glossy finish

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother, unless you love fun puns!
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for my pun-loving mother-in-law, and she really liked them. Good quality, I like the size (great for a little note, which is exactly what these cards are for), and she and my four year old were going bananas over them for days with each other. Again, these are grape, not too cheesy, I felt that the price wasn't too forking high, and owl'd order them again, should the need arise. Please help, I can't stop the wordplay!
customer_reviews.author: andy

customer_reviews.title: Adorable. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: These are inspiring & creative cards that are sure to make someone’s day. I thought about finding a little frame for some of them for myself. The cards are good quality, not cheap looking. Cute decoration. Full of color.
customer_reviews.author: Mrsfavre

customer_reviews.title: They come in a nice plastic case and arrived in perfect condition
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to write my brother when he was in boot camp for the navy. They come in a nice plastic case and arrived in perfect condition. The cards are about the size of regular thank you card packs and were perfect for writing some daily notes to him. The cards were sturdy and the envelopes were safe for mailing and the envelopes sealed well.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Ison

customer_reviews.title: Kids appreciate funny cards and receiving mail.
customer_reviews.text: I like to send cards to nieces and nephews that are cute, funny, and inexpensive. It wasn't easy to find something that fit all of these descriptions, but these cards met my expectations. I include little inspirational quotes with every card and they love getting mail. It feels better to send cards than it does a text or an email, and it makes them feel special. These cards are a great help in my efforts to stay connected with the kids in my life that I love.
customer_reviews.author: cathy c.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cards!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I give each other a card at the beginning to each month to remember the good things that happened in the previous one and show excitement for the four following weeks to come. So these cards work perfectly as they are cute, fun, and will make her smile! She got me another set from this seller (the one with puns about fruits) and I love them very much! Definitely recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: jesushidalgo

customer_reviews.title: NOT A BRAND NEW ITEM
customer_reviews.text: The box that contains the cards was cut open and the cards were not bound together like its suppose to be when it is a brand new product. The edges of the cards are dented since the box was cut open. Very disappointed in this shipment. I was waiting on these cards to send for a time sensitive gift, but now I have to go out and quickly find an alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: So cute to have on hand
customer_reviews.text: I find myself sending a lot more cards due to the current state of affairs. I love that you can find a reason to send any one of these cards. They are all really cute and my 7 year old particularly enjoys all of the puns. They seem to be made well and are made on thick cardstock complete with envelopes and stickers to seal.
customer_reviews.author: jennys

customer_reviews.title: BUY AMERICAN
customer_reviews.text: I have been ordering all my greeting cards from NOBLEWORKS for the past two years. I get quality products for a fair price and support small American business. My family and friends are always complimenting me on my choice of messages presented in these wonderfully unique cards. I will not purchase cards anywhere else. I hope you will give them a try.
customer_reviews.author: annie

customer_reviews.title: These cards were fantastic. I appreciated that they were packaged in a ...
customer_reviews.text: These cards were fantastic. I appreciated that they were packaged in a plastic container that was placed inside of a bubblewrap-interior envelope. This prevents any bending or folding and the cards arrived safe and sound, in pristine condition. The cards were made of thickish cardstock paper. The outsides of the cards (the front with the decal and the back) have a smooth, glossy finish. The inside of the cards have the same feel and texture as regular cardstock, making it easy to write a personal message. Note that the inside of the cards are also completely blank. Overall, a great, simple. classy, quality item. Funny, simplistic design, good packaging, and quality material. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: All 10 Cards. The Complete Set. All Poor Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Every single card in the pack of ten has a blue line on the front that clearly makes it a second. 10 cards, 10 blue lines. Where’s the quality control? I’ve purchased cards from the Best Card Company in the past and am surprised such lousy quality made it to my door.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas C Hargrove

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it... do not put these in your cart!
customer_reviews.text: I will not purchase cards made by this company again- as glossy and thick as they appear, there are blemishes on the fronts of some cards. Did I get an unreliable pack? Perhaps. However, there are much better card packs available through Amazon and this company left me wishing I had stuck with the others.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Bavaria

customer_reviews.title: Simple but cute!
customer_reviews.text: These cards are simple but cute, and made from nice quality paper. I actually ordered several of the different designs and i like then all. The romantic ones will be my Valentine's for my in penpals next year!
customer_reviews.author: Deb W.

customer_reviews.title: Came with printing error
customer_reviews.text: My cards came each with a scratch and long streak of color from the printer down the middle. I was really disappointed because they were kinda cute otherwise. I won't be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: another

customer_reviews.title: Cute, well made, my grandkids love receiving them!
customer_reviews.text: These cards are so adorable. And sturdy. Using them to mail my grandchildren a dollar each every two weeks, so they can learn about the postal system. They loved the artwork!
customer_reviews.author: Martha B.

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Truly the BEST cards!! I think they are so colorful and funny. I send them to each grandkid every week. They LOVE getting actual postal mail so much more than an email during this time of separation.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis L. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Even Cuter Than They Look
customer_reviews.text: I surprised my granddaughters today with the adorable notecards I ordered for them. They were delighted! The colors were bold (was hoping), the critters all super cute. They were a big hit. I will be order more once these are gone. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Card

customer_reviews.title: cute and punny...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THESE our daughter is going to use to write to her friend in the marines...cute humor!! made well. arrived safely and quickly very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: chinhappy

customer_reviews.title: Colorful Quality Note Cards
customer_reviews.text: Very nice note cards and are as pictured (so did not add photo). Colorful and good quality. The inside is also pale color instead of plain white, different colors like the different LEGO patterns. Very happy with my note card pick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved these
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these. They were perfect quirky jokes. You should definitely send these to your friends and family because they are just so cute
customer_reviews.author: kerstin rennie

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: These cards are adorable! They are perfect little blank note cards to send to my husband while he is stationed overseas.
customer_reviews.author: kmthoennes

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: The weight of both the card and envelope was very good. Heavier weight. The seal on the envelope was adequate and no tape needed to seal. The colors on the card were strong, vivid and as shown.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun cards to send to make folks smile
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute and an excuse to mail someone a hand written note too......would purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Kat E

customer_reviews.title: Nice paper quality and funny!
customer_reviews.text: These are glossy cards, just as described. The weight of the paper is nice and not cheap feeling. No repeats and all unique. I use them for notes to my kids in college. They need a laugh and these are very entertaining!
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: These say "thank you" not "miss you"
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to write notes to friends who had moved away...turns out the little monsters are saying "thank you" not "miss you" like I originally thought! Still super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Berglund

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: The product offered humor for a few friends that live out of state! The material is sturdy and has a gloss finish.

customer_reviews.title: Garenteed to make you smile!
customer_reviews.text: These cards are fun and are sure to bring a smile to the recipient's face. I like the inside is blank so the card can be for anything.

customer_reviews.title: Note cards
customer_reviews.text: I use note cards to write to my grandchildren periodically as they love to get mail. These are very cute and something they will really enjoy.

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Love these cards. So cute and unique. I love owls so they were perfect for me. I sent graduation thank you notes. These were great. All different and blank so the left over ones could be used for anything

customer_reviews.title: Great cards

customer_reviews.text: Cards were as advertised but the packaging was dirty dirty. Sticky and covered in something brown.

customer_reviews.title: Cute, As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute. They're shiny and look just as advertised. No complaints here!

customer_reviews.title: So perfectly punny!
customer_reviews.text: These cards are absolutely cute and perfect to send to my boyfriend who is currently in training. We are both veterans but I am no longer active duty and am currently writing to him from the hospital so these cards are keeping both of our spirits up. Thank you, The Best Card Company!!

customer_reviews.title: Great pack of cards.
customer_reviews.text: I needed to stock some cards so I wouldn't have to run out and buy one everytime an event came up. These are great, comical, and blank so you can use for every occasion. Well, maybe not for condolences, but yeah, other than that, works for everything.

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality
customer_reviews.text: These cards are very cute. The card stock is very high quality (not flimsy like so many others), the pictures are nicely drawn and the phrases are cute. All in all I'm really happy with this purchase!

customer_reviews.title: Super funny and cute

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: They were smaller than expected but I really like them. Super cute for a nice card.

customer_reviews.title: Good gift for child.
customer_reviews.text: GIFT TO GRANDSON ON GRADUATING FROM JR HIOH. He is a whiz with lego and duplo. Guess what? He actually wrote me an adorable thank you note on a card, thanking me for cards and other gifts. I feel it was good starter for him.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Not the best deal, but worth it, so original
customer_reviews.text: This is much more than I want to spend on small, blank cards, but they are so cute and funny. They put a smile on my friends' faces.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Cards for the Punny Friend

product_meta.title: Fun Puns Blank Note Cards (Box of 10) Funny All Occasion Greeting Card with Envelope Cartoon Animated Stationery for Clever Birthday, Business, and Well Wishes Pun Notecards (4 inch x 5 inch) M2975OCB
feature_bullets: ASSORTED 10 CARD SET - 4 x 5.12 Inch cards with white envelopes. These funny box set showcase a variety of puns. They feature modern pops of bright colors. No matter the purpose of your card, these are a perfect choice for a variety of occasions! We offer a wide assortment of designs and art styles, offering a unique match for men and women looking for the right notecard for their special, personal message.

FOR ALL OCCASIONS - Perfect, high-quality stationery for writing birthday, congratulations, and thank you sentiments and messages. All mini cards ship with an envelope & arrive boxed for your convenience. They store easily in a home office, desk, or at a business. A variety of the art and designs in our note card sets look great framed! Try framing them individually, or grouping several in a collage frame, to create visually appealing wall decor.

ABOUT THE CARD - Keeping US jobs at home, most of our products are Made in the USA (and Canada) for almost 40 years. We use premium, thick, snow white cardstock, w/ 30% recycled content plus FSC’s (Forest Stewardship Council) responsibly forested renewable resources certified pulp (no papyrus, naturally). Print on demand technology reduces waste and further minimizes environmental impact.

ABOUT US - Founded in 1980, NobleWorks - and The Best Card Company, its non humor division - is an award winning brand. We’re an American based, family owned stationery publisher. A proud board member of the Greeting Card Association, we strive for 100% perfection and customer satisfaction - every card, every order, every time. We are here to serve whether you purchased our fold over stationary note cards directly from us or from authorized resellers.
